item.title: A Beamer Template for W.P. Carey Affiliated Researchers
item.description: (Disclaimer: This is my own creation. Users can use this at their own discretion) A Simple Beamer Template I created a simple Beamer template based on a research presentation I gave at a recent conference. I realized there was nothing specific to my department/school available out in the internet, so I had to create one from scratch. Here are the sample slides: PDF Please feel free to fork this from my Github repo.
